text:
Question about blog tags: Can anyone give any insight as to how HubSpot prioritizes/orders blog tags?

We are using the first in the list to show on the card of the blog post, but HubSpot likes to reorder them willy nilly.
gonna tag the man <@U38EZFVFE>
Can you show an instance where it isn't obeying
As you add tags HubSpot keeps reordering them
But it can be reordered no?
no, not in the UI
Hmm...
here’s another three I just tried to put in
I entered them as best of -> company news -> expert advice
it doesn’t seem to be alphabetical either
<@U7SL518D6>  <@U2H3TT8F2>  might need your input
bring in the big guns
Can you link me to one of your posts with the tags on it, I think I recall running into this myself way back when
Sure <@U2H3TT8F2> <https://www.sama.com/blog/samasource-is-now-sama>

Basically the goal was to show a “top tag” on the blog card, but have it fall under a number of different tags/categories. <@U38EZFVFE> helped us build this functionally where the first tag is the one that shows up on the card, but my content editors can’t set the order because on the post settings, HubSpot seems to randomly set the order

it looks like the order is generated based on date of creation so the older tags will show first and the newer tags later. See the developer info and look at `content.topic_list` . Let me see if there is anything i can find out about being able to do this (without having to create a custom module of sorts on the post template for this).
:thumbsup:
So it looks like in order to make this happen, there is a lot that we need to look at in the backend. It is on the teams radar, however, I dont have any defined timing on when it will be available.
thanks <@U2H3TT8F2> Do you have any other ideas how to achieve this functionality in the meantime?

You could probably do this with a new module that contains a choice field that is populated from the blog_tags() function. Similar to this users post on the community: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Dynamically-populate-choices-in-custom-module-choice-field/td-p/252054>

Hi,

Can anyone let me know if we can customise the deals order on Contact Info page.
Like for e.g, currently, I have an order like -
Deal A, Deal B & Deal C
and I want it to change it to Deal B, Deal C & Deal A.

Is it possible?

Also, can we add custom properties there?
